hero.title: Hi — I'm Tahmid Ashfaque
hero.subtitle: Designing elegant creative projects • Creative Designer & Student

about.bio: I'm a creative professional at the intersection of design, technology, and communication. As a driven O'Level candidate, I pair my academic pursuits with hands-on experience in bringing ideas to life in the digital space. I am passionate about using my skills to help organizations grow their digital footprint and connect with their audience meaningfully. I am currently open to freelance projects and connecting with professionals in the tech and creative industries.

education.description: Curerently Focusing on Advanced maths, Chemistry, Physics and Computer Science

experience.description: As the Head of Creative Design & Media at the International Global Affairs Council (IGAC), I lead the organization's digital strategy. This role involves managing our online presence across all platforms, spearheading media campaigns, and overseeing the physical logistics for large-scale, successful youth conferences like Model United Nations and Business Summits.

currentProject.title: Interactive Portfolio Builder
currentProject.summary: A drag-and-drop portfolio builder with real-time preview
currentProject.description:
Currently developing an intuitive web application that allows users to create beautiful portfolio websites without coding. Features include real-time editing, multiple templates, and seamless deployment options.

Built with modern web technologies including vanilla JavaScript, CSS Grid, and a component-based architecture. The project focuses on accessibility and performance while maintaining a delightful user experience.

projects.title: Elegant Landing Page
projects.summary: A minimal, conversion-focused landing page template
projects.description:
Designed and developed a clean, modern landing page template optimized for conversions. Features smooth animations, responsive design, and accessibility-first approach.

Built with semantic HTML, CSS variables for easy theming, and vanilla JavaScript for interactions. The template includes multiple sections, contact forms, and is fully customizable through CSS custom properties.

projects.title: Responsive Photo Gallery
projects.summary: A performance-optimized gallery with lazy loading and lightbox
projects.description:
Built a high-performance photo gallery featuring lazy loading, responsive images with srcset, and a smooth lightbox experience. Supports keyboard navigation and is fully accessible.

Implemented advanced features like image preloading, WebP format support, and smooth transitions. The gallery adapts to different screen sizes and provides an optimal viewing experience across all devices.

projects.title: Minimalist Task Manager
projects.description:
Developed a minimalist task management application focused on simplicity and productivity. Features include drag-and-drop organization, keyboard shortcuts, and local storage persistence.

The app emphasizes clean design and smooth interactions while maintaining high performance. Built without frameworks to keep the bundle size minimal and loading times fast.
